snippet: Senator Marco Rubio, Republican of Florida, has been part of a bipartisan group drafting legislation in secret since the November election.
abstract: Questions remain whether Florida Sen Marco Rubio will ultimately sign onto bill for broad overhaul of immigration laws that he has been drafting with bipartisan group; analysts say Rubio, who is seen as rising conservative hero and possible 2016 presidential contender, may not want to risk ruffling his Republican base despite his call for immigration law changes.
lead_paragraph: Senator Marco Rubio, Republican of Florida, has been part of a bipartisan group drafting legislation in secret since the November election.

headline.main: Rubio, Amid Planning, Is Yet to Commit on Immigration Bill
headline.print_headline: Rubio, Amid Planning, Is Yet to Commit on Immigration Bill
